faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.q1: How long does the visa application process take?
faq.a1: Processing times vary by visa type and country, typically ranging from 2-12 months.
faq.q2: Do I need a lawyer for my immigration application?
faq.a2: While not always required, professional guidance can significantly improve your chances of success.
faq.q3: What documents do I need for a work visa?
faq.a3: Common requirements include passport, job offer letter, educational credentials, and proof of work experience.
faq.q4: Can I apply for permanent residency while on a work visa?
faq.a4: In many countries, yes. Requirements vary by jurisdiction and visa category.
